text:
Science fiction plots keep emerging in this pandemic. 

"A troop of monkeys in India attacked a medical official and snatched away blood samples of patients who had tested positive for the novel coronavirus, authorities said on Friday." https://t.co/Fo0jpcpy5i 

#PlanetOfTheApes
